title: Casablanca
description: A man must choose between love and virtue in WWII-era Morocco.

title: His Girl Friday
description: A fast-talking newspaper editor tries to win back his ex-wife.

title: Night of the Living Dead
description: A group of people tries to survive a zombie outbreak in a farmhouse.

title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
description: Aliens attempt to stop humanity from creating a doomsday weapon.

title: The General
description: A Southern railroad engineer defends his train during the Civil War.

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
description: Holmes must recover a valuable bomb sight and stop Moriarty.

title: The Great Dictator
description: Charlie Chaplin mocks Hitler in a powerful satire.

title: The Little Princess
description: A young girl is left at a boarding school when her father goes to war.

title: Meet John Doe
description: A fake suicide note becomes a media sensation.

title: Charade
description: A widow is pursued by several men who want a fortune her husband stole.
